actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.
Executive Comment Requested from OMB, DOT, GAO, USDA, Treasury, Labor, Commerce, US Postal Service.
Referred to Subcommittee on Legislation and National Security.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Legislation and National Security

official_title: A bill to provide for the inclusion of certain Federal entities in the budget totals, effective with the 1985 budget.

summary.text: Honest Budgeting Act of 1979 - Amends the Rural Electrification Act of 1936, the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974, the Regional Rail Reorganization Act of 1973, and the Federal Financing Bank Act of 1973 to require the fiscal operations of the Rural Electrification and Telephone Revolving Fund, the Rural Telephone Bank, the United States Railway Association, the Pension Benefit Guaranty Corporation, the Federal Financing Bank, and the Postal Service Fund to be included in the budget totals of the United States Government effective with the fiscal year 1983 budget.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the inclusion of certain Federal entities in the budget totals, effective with the 1985 budget.
